artist: Artist: After Titian (Tiziano Vecelli); Draftsman: Bourdon; Engraver: Victor Dague
description: woman with long curly hair looking in a small mirror held by a man behind her; man also holds a round mirror behind her head
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in margin in black: No.455  TITIEN   Eco\'le Itali\'en / Desine par Bourdon   Grave par V\'or Dague. /  LE TITIEN ET SA MAITRESSE  | on sheet in pencil: 2-487
portfolio: From Galerie du Musee Napoleon; Galerie Napoleon; Galerie du Musee de France
title: Le Titien et sa Maitresse
